solution_line_template: The pie shop has {num_whole_pies} x {slices_per_pie} = <<{num_whole_pies}*{slices_per_pie}={total_slices}>>{total_slices} slices of custard pie.
Therefore, the pie shop will earn ${price_per_slice} x {total_slices} = $<<{price_per_slice}*{total_slices}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings} for the {total_slices} slices of custard pie.
